liquidity with provided Dai by borrowing yDai with some of the Dai. Caller must have approved the proxy using`controller.addDelegate(yieldProxy)` Caller must have approved the dai transfer with `dai.approve(daiUsed)`","params":{"daiUsed":"amount of Dai to use to mint liquidity. ","maxYDai":"maximum amount of yDai to be borrowed to mint liquidity. "},"returns":{"_0":"The amount of liquidity tokens minted.  "}},"authorizePool(address,address,bytes,bytes,bytes)":{"details":"Given a pool and 3 signatures, it `permit`'s dai and yDAI for that pool and adds it as a delegate"},"borrowDaiForMaximumYDai(address,bytes32,uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Borrow yDai from Controller and sell it immediately for Dai, for a maximum yDai debt. Must have approved the operator with `controller.addDelegate(yieldProxy.address)`.","params":{"collateral":"Valid collateral type.","daiToBorrow":"Exact amount of Dai that should be obtained.","maturity":"Maturity of an added series","maximumYDai":"Maximum amount of YDai to borrow.","to":"Wallet to send the resulting Dai to."}},"borrowMinimumDaiForYDai(address,bytes32,uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Borrow yDai from Controller and sell it immediately for Dai, if a minimum amount of Dai can be obtained such. Must have approved the operator with `controller.addDelegate(yieldProxy.address)`.","params":{"collateral":"Valid collateral type.","maturity":"Maturity of an added series","minimumDaiToBorrow":"Minimum amount of Dai that should be borrowed.","to":"Wallet to sent the resulting Dai to.","yDaiToBorrow":"Amount of yDai to borrow."}},"buyDai(address,address,uint128,uint128)":{"details":"Buy Dai for yDai","params":{"daiOut":"Amount of dai being bought","maxYDaiIn":"Maximum amount of yDai being sold","to":"Wallet receiving the dai being bought"}},"buyDaiWithSignature(address,address,uint128,uint128,bytes)":{"details":"Buy Dai for yDai and permits infinite yDAI to the pool","params":{"daiOut":"Amount of dai being bought","maxYDaiIn":"Maximum amount of yDai being sold","signature":"The `permit` call's signature","to":"Wallet receiving the dai being bought"}},"buyYDai(address,address,uint128,uint128)":{"details":"Buy yDai for dai","params":{"maxDaiIn":"Maximum amount of dai being sold","to":"Wallet receiving the yDai being bought","yDaiOut":"Amount of yDai being bought"}},"daiForYDai(address,uint256)":{"details":"Amount of dai debt that will result from migrating yDai debt from Yield to MakerDAO"},"executeOnFlashMint(address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Callback from `YDai.flashMint()`"},"makerToYield(address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Transfer debt and collateral from MakerDAO to Yield Needs vat.hope(splitter.address, { from: user }); Needs controller.addDelegate(splitter.address, { from: user });","params":{"daiAmount":"dai debt to move from MakerDAO to Yield. Denominated in Dai (= art * rate)","pool":"The pool to trade in (and therefore yDai series to borrow)","user":"Vault to migrate.","wethAmount":"weth to move from MakerDAO to Yield. Needs to be high enough to collateralize the dai debt in Yield, and low enough to make sure that debt left in MakerDAO is also collateralized."}},"onboard(address,bytes,bytes)":{"details":"Performs the initial onboarding of the user. It `permit`'s DAI to be used by the proxy, and adds the proxy as a delegate in the controller"},"post(address)":{"details":"Users use `post` in YieldProxy to post ETH to the Controller (amount = msg.value), which will be converted to Weth here.","params":{"to":"Yield Vault to deposit collateral in."}},"removeLiquidityEarly(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Burns tokens and repays yDai debt. Buys needed yDai or sells any excess, and all Dai is returned. Caller must have approved the proxy using`controller.addDelegate(yieldProxy)` and `pool.addDelegate(yieldProxy)` Caller must have approved the liquidity burn with `pool.approve(poolTokens)`","params":{"minimumDai":"minimum amount of Dai to be bought with yDai when burning. ","poolTokens":"amount of pool tokens to burn. "}},"removeLiquidityMature(address,uint256)":{"details":"Burns tokens and repays yDai debt after Maturity.  Caller must have approved the proxy using`controller.addDelegate(yieldProxy)` Caller must have approved the liquidity burn with `pool.approve(poolTokens)`","params":{"poolTokens":"amount of pool tokens to burn."}},"repayDaiWithSignature(bytes32,uint256,address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Burns Dai from caller to repay debt in a Yield Vault. User debt is decreased for the given collateral and yDai series, in Yield vault `to`. The amount of debt repaid changes according to series maturity and MakerDAO rate and chi, depending on collateral type. `A signature is provided as a parameter to this function, so that `dai.approve()` doesn't need to be called.","params":{"collateral":"Valid collateral type.","daiAmount":"Amount of Dai to use for debt repayment.","maturity":"Maturity of an added series","signature":"The `permit` call's signature","to":"Yield vault to repay debt for."}},"repayMinimumYDaiDebtForDai(address,bytes32,uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Repay an amount of yDai debt in Controller using a given amount of Dai exchanged for yDai at pool rates, with a minimum of yDai debt required to be paid. Must have approved the operator with `pool.addDelegate(yieldProxy.address)`.","params":{"collateral":"Valid collateral type.","maturity":"Maturity of an added series","minimumYDaiRepayment":"Minimum amount of yDai debt to repay.","repaymentInDai":"Exact amount of Dai that should be spent on the repayment.","to":"Yield Vault to repay yDai debt for."}},"repayYDaiDebtForMaximumDai(address,bytes32,uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Repay an amount of yDai debt in Controller using Dai exchanged for yDai at pool rates, up to a maximum amount of Dai spent. Must have approved the operator with `pool.addDelegate(yieldProxy.address)`.","params":{"collateral":"Valid collateral type.","maturity":"Maturity of an added series","maximumRepaymentInDai":"Maximum amount of Dai that should be spent on the repayment.","to":"Yield Vault to repay yDai debt for.","yDaiRepayment":"Amount of yDai debt to repay."}},"sellDai(address,address,uint128,uint128)":{"details":"Sell Dai for yDai","params":{"daiIn":"Amount of dai being sold","minYDaiOut":"Minimum amount of yDai being bought","to":"Wallet receiving the yDai being bought"}},"sellYDai(address,address,uint128,uint128)":{"details":"Sell yDai for Dai","params":{"minDaiOut":"Minimum amount of dai being bought","to":"Wallet receiving the dai being bought","yDaiIn":"Amount of yDai being sold"}},"wethForDai(uint256)":{"details":"Minimum weth needed to collateralize an amount of dai in MakerDAO"},"wethForYDai(uint256)":{"details":"Minimum weth needed to collateralize an amount of yDai in Yield. Yes, it's the same formula."},"withdraw(address,uint256)":{"details":"Users wishing to withdraw their Weth as ETH from the Controller should use this function. Users must have called `controller.addDelegate(yieldProxy.address)` to authorize YieldProxy to act in their behalf.","params":{"amount":"Amount of weth to move.","to":"Wallet to send Eth to."}},"yDaiForDai(address,uint256)":{"details":"Amount of yDai debt that will result from migrating Dai debt from MakerDAO to Yield"},"yieldToMaker(address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Transfer debt and collateral from Yield to MakerDAO Needs vat.hope(splitter.address, { from: user }); Needs controller.addDelegate(splitter.address, { from: user });","params":{"pool":"The pool to trade in (and therefore yDai series to migrate)","user":"Vault to migrate.","wethAmount":"weth to move from Yield to MakerDAO. Needs to be high enough to collateralize the dai debt in MakerDAO, and low enough to make sure that debt left in Yield is also collateralized.","yDaiAmount":"yDai debt to move from Yield to MakerDAO."}}}},"userdoc":{"methods":{}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/C/Users/bruce/dev/yield/yDai/contracts/peripheral/YieldProxy.sol":"YieldProxy"},"evmVersion":"istanbul","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/C/Users/bruce/dev/yield/yDai/contracts/helpers/DecimalMath.sol":{"keccak256":"0xc23609b01b345abe2db0b1a357826bb01a0faf0584b22c953eb5c9d48cf10e45","license":"GPL-3.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://8fdc0c502effd495a366615da8f18608e804574e747702e296fcc83c2eb1d916","dweb:/ipfs/Qmd8X9K7jrye9yyd62Qwbw3PaYYbtUQWfCSN64DFJTSgew"]},"/C/Users/bruce/dev/yield/yDai/contracts/interfaces/IChai.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe5dd4da060b004fe481d11a7730ab1d7847fb68e78f227063fbe1be9c35c0224","license":"GPL-3.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://0e77414abebd73dd7cf52702e61ea04453736d89312ca54a2f024268570ff5e4","dweb:/ipfs/QmcY89whHT6UDUTRVuVKVZTJj3JBpr4sxYNokTHS2GkiWn"]},"/C/Users/bruce/dev/yield/yDai/contracts/interfaces/IController.sol":{"keccak256":"0x350a1b93a056012874e451ae655c84dfe951752d1058da88cb22801b3e5535e7","license":"GPL-3.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://67fa20722edc902dc0c137d35c4a1d28a4889133821e0ccbc4cd13fb522a1784","dweb:/ipfs/QmaPchNXCow6b46rxsNcEbVqxPGSrNMdHLDtA4dCPotMVi"]},"/C/Users/bruce/dev/yield/yDai/contracts/interfaces/IDai.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe5fdeb76ae5d8ac9b2ba5ecc1e66c2e93dbc53727612ce19e9ce5275ddd01b45","license":"GPL-3.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://b906a13f23ab4e47d57c47a7e4b5fa08c66ef2b9be2edbd357786f568fcdcf75","dweb:/ipfs/QmaHS2CWAt6vaDwDk9rEttGCYk28CdxEj8MZR9DFS3xqp9"]},"/C/Users/bruce/dev/yield/yDai/contracts/interfaces/IDaiJoin.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe6ff5bb654b6896e7850d6e7c353be443a7c48992fbc4cdbcd414f734f9f5082","license":"GPL-3.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://46f316bb96fe7e3adf53b9dbcfb712c545b115ff5c7ecc992561614d2e725541","dweb:/ipfs/QmYPyP7J1BVmBULuZV3oiim7tvqakEiALD9Z2K3ZmniWWh"]},"/C/Users/bruce/dev/yield/yDai/contracts/interfaces/IDelegable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x0e documentation.text: @dev Safe casting from uint256 to uint128
@dev Safe casting from uint256 to int256
@dev Performs the initial onboarding of the user. It `permit`'s DAI to be used by the proxy, and adds the proxy as a delegate in the controller
@dev Given a pool and 3 signatures, it `permit`'s dai and yDAI for that pool and adds it as a delegate
@dev The WETH9 contract will send ether to YieldProxy on `weth.withdraw` using this function.

@dev Users use `post` in YieldProxy to post ETH to the Controller (amount = msg.value), which will be converted to Weth here.
 @param to Yield Vault to deposit collateral in.
@dev Return to caller all posted chai if there is no debt, converted to dai, plus any dai remaining in the contract.

@dev The WETH9 contract will send ether to YieldProxy on `weth.withdraw` using this function.

@dev Users use `post` in YieldProxy to post ETH to the Controller (amount = msg.value), which will be converted to Weth here.
 @param to Yield Vault to deposit collateral in.

documentation.text: @dev Callback from `YDai.flashMint()`
@dev Minimum weth needed to collateralize an amount of dai in MakerDAO
@dev Minimum weth needed to collateralize an amount of yDai in Yield. Yes, it's the same formula.
@dev Amount of yDai debt that will result from migrating Dai debt from MakerDAO to Yield
@dev Amount of dai debt that will result from migrating yDai debt from Yield to MakerDAO

addLiquidity(address,uint256,uint256).details: Mints liquidity with provided Dai by borrowing yDai with some of the Dai. Caller must have approved the proxy using`controller.addDelegate(yieldProxy)` Caller must have approved the dai transfer with `dai.approve(daiUsed)`

params.daiUsed: amount of Dai to use to mint liquidity.
params.maxYDai: maximum amount of yDai to be borrowed to mint liquidity.

returns._0: The amount of liquidity tokens minted.

authorizePool(address,address,bytes,byte.details: Given a pool and 3 signatures, it `permit`'s dai and yDAI for that pool and adds it as a delegate

borrowDaiForMaximumYDai(address,bytes32,.details: Borrow yDai from Controller and sell it immediately for Dai, for a maximum yDai debt. Must have approved the operator with `controller.addDelegate(yieldProxy.address)`.

params.daiToBorrow: Exact amount of Dai that should be obtained.
params.maximumYDai: Maximum amount of YDai to borrow.
params.to: Wallet to send the resulting Dai to.

borrowMinimumDaiForYDai(address,bytes32,.details: Borrow yDai from Controller and sell it immediately for Dai, if a minimum amount of Dai can be obtained such. Must have approved the operator with `controller.addDelegate(yieldProxy.address)`.

params.minimumDaiToBorrow: Minimum amount of Dai that should be borrowed.
params.to: Wallet to sent the resulting Dai to.

params.maxYDaiIn: Maximum amount of yDai being sold
params.to: Wallet receiving the dai being bought

buyDaiWithSignature(address,address,uint.details: Buy Dai for yDai and permits infinite yDAI to the pool

params.maxYDaiIn: Maximum amount of yDai being sold
params.to: Wallet receiving the dai being bought

params.maxDaiIn: Maximum amount of dai being sold
params.to: Wallet receiving the yDai being bought

daiForYDai(address,uint256).details: Amount of dai debt that will result from migrating yDai debt from Yield to MakerDAO

makerToYield(address,address,uint256,uin.details: Transfer debt and collateral from MakerDAO to Yield Needs vat.hope(splitter.address, { from: user }); Needs controller.addDelegate(splitter.address, { from: user });

params.daiAmount: dai debt to move from MakerDAO to Yield. Denominated in Dai (= art * rate)
params.pool: The pool to trade in (and therefore yDai series to borrow)
params.wethAmount: weth to move from MakerDAO to Yield. Needs to be high enough to collateralize the dai debt in Yield, and low enough to make sure that debt left in MakerDAO is also collateralized.

onboard(address,bytes,bytes).details: Performs the initial onboarding of the user. It `permit`'s DAI to be used by the proxy, and adds the proxy as a delegate in the controller

post(address).details: Users use `post` in YieldProxy to post ETH to the Controller (amount = msg.value), which will be converted to Weth here.

params.to: Yield Vault to deposit collateral in.

removeLiquidityEarly(address,uint256,uin.details: Burns tokens and repays yDai debt. Buys needed yDai or sells any excess, and all Dai is returned. Caller must have approved the proxy using`controller.addDelegate(yieldProxy)` and `pool.addDelegate(yieldProxy)` Caller must have approved the liquidity burn with `pool.approve(poolTokens)`

params.minimumDai: minimum amount of Dai to be bought with yDai when burning.
params.poolTokens: amount of pool tokens to burn.

removeLiquidityMature(address,uint256).details: Burns tokens and repays yDai debt after Maturity.  Caller must have approved the proxy using`controller.addDelegate(yieldProxy)` Caller must have approved the liquidity burn with `pool.approve(poolTokens)`

params.poolTokens: amount of pool tokens to burn.

repayDaiWithSignature(bytes32,uint256,ad.details: Burns Dai from caller to repay debt in a Yield Vault. User debt is decreased for the given collateral and yDai series, in Yield vault `to`. The amount of debt repaid changes according to series maturity and MakerDAO rate and chi, depending on collateral type. `A signature is provided as a parameter to this function, so that `dai.approve()` doesn't need to be called.

params.daiAmount: Amount of Dai to use for debt repayment.
params.to: Yield vault to repay debt for.

repayMinimumYDaiDebtForDai(address,bytes.details: Repay an amount of yDai debt in Controller using a given amount of Dai exchanged for yDai at pool rates, with a minimum of yDai debt required to be paid. Must have approved the operator with `pool.addDelegate(yieldProxy.address)`.

params.minimumYDaiRepayment: Minimum amount of yDai debt to repay.
params.repaymentInDai: Exact amount of Dai that should be spent on the repayment.
params.to: Yield Vault to repay yDai debt for.

repayYDaiDebtForMaximumDai(address,bytes.details: Repay an amount of yDai debt in Controller using Dai exchanged for yDai at pool rates, up to a maximum amount of Dai spent. Must have approved the operator with `pool.addDelegate(yieldProxy.address)`.

params.maximumRepaymentInDai: Maximum amount of Dai that should be spent on the repayment.
params.to: Yield Vault to repay yDai debt for.
params.yDaiRepayment: Amount of yDai debt to repay.

params.minYDaiOut: Minimum amount of yDai being bought
params.to: Wallet receiving the yDai being bought

params.minDaiOut: Minimum amount of dai being bought
params.to: Wallet receiving the dai being bought

wethForDai(uint256).details: Minimum weth needed to collateralize an amount of dai in MakerDAO

wethForYDai(uint256).details: Minimum weth needed to collateralize an amount of yDai in Yield. Yes, it's the same formula.

withdraw(address,uint256).details: Users wishing to withdraw their Weth as ETH from the Controller should use this function. Users must have called `controller.addDelegate(yieldProxy.address)` to authorize YieldProxy to act in their behalf.

yDaiForDai(address,uint256).details: Amount of yDai debt that will result from migrating Dai debt from MakerDAO to Yield

yieldToMaker(address,address,uint256,uin.details: Transfer debt and collateral from Yield to MakerDAO Needs vat.hope(splitter.address, { from: user }); Needs controller.addDelegate(splitter.address, { from: user });

params.pool: The pool to trade in (and therefore yDai series to migrate)
params.wethAmount: weth to move from Yield to MakerDAO. Needs to be high enough to collateralize the dai debt in MakerDAO, and low enough to make sure that debt left in Yield is also collateralized.
params.yDaiAmount: yDai debt to move from Yield to MakerDAO.
